mutants.code:
from math import factorial
from functools import reduce
from operator import mul
from collections import Counter

def count_permutations(inp):
    inp_str = str(inp)
    total_permutations = factorial(len(inp_str))
    repetitions_factor = reduce(mul, map(factorial, Counter(inp_str).values()), 1)
    return total_permutations / repetitions_factor

from math import factorial
from functools import reduce
from operator import mul
from collections import Counter

def count_permutations(inp):
    inp_str = str(inp)
    total_permutations = factorial(len(inp_str))
    repetitions_factor = reduce(mul, map(factorial, Counter(inp_str).values()), 1)
    return total_permutations * repetitions_factor

from math import factorial
from functools import reduce
from operator import mul
from collections import Counter

def count_permutations(inp):
    inp_str = str(inp)
    total_permutations = factorial(len(inp_str))
    repetitions_factor = reduce(mul, map(factorial, Counter(inp_str).values()), 2)
    return total_permutations // repetitions_factor

from math import factorial
from functools import reduce
from operator import mul
from collections import Counter

def count_permutations(inp):

    repetitions_factor = reduce(mul, map(factorial, Counter(inp_str).values()), 0)
    return total_permutations // repetitions_factor

from functools import reduce

from collections import Counter

from math import factorial
from functools import reduce
from operator import mul
from collections import Counter

def count_permutations(inp):
    inp_str = str(inp)
    total_permutations = factorial(len(inp_str))
    repetitions_factor = reduce(mul, map(factorial, Counter(inp_str).values()), -1)
    return total_permutations // repetitions_factor
